definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life

sentences.english: Smooth downshifts are enhanced by a standard, back-torque limiting clutch.
sentences.chinese: 光滑平順而得到加強，一個標準，回扭矩限制離合器。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，離合器以離合器盤爲其主要部件。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，離合器以離合器盤爲其主要部件。

sentences.english: After gasoline and oil filling, check handle bar, brake and clutch.
sentences.chinese: 在汽油和油，檢查處理吧，剎車和離合器。

sentences.english: It adoptss pneumatic cluth to control .
The new 7-speed DSG represents the next stage in the development of dual-clutch technology.
sentences.chinese: 新7檔DSG展現了雙離合器技術發展的下一個階段。

sentences.english: And install clutch safe-device to prevent the damage.
sentences.chinese: 並設有離合安全裝置，以防超負荷引起的機器損傷。

sentences.english: Double safety unit prevents screw tap from wearing out.
sentences.chinese: 二重安全離合器裝置能防止絲攻之折損。

sentences.english: It is only when the clutch disc is slipping against the flywheel that wearing occurs.
sentences.chinese: 只有當離合器盤在飛輪上打滑時，纔會出現磨損現象。

sentences.english: Clutch and overspeed provision during autorotation .
sentences.chinese: 離合器和超速期間提供自轉。

sentences.english: If above two requirements are met, it indicates that the silicon oil fan clutch works normally.
sentences.chinese: 符合上述兩種要求，說明硅油風扇離合器工作正常。

sentences.english: Used to seeing the kind of joys and sorrows, may suddenly feel this is the life.
sentences.chinese: 看慣了那種悲歡離合，突然覺得可能這纔是生活。

sentences.english: This can be regarded as a constraint factor of the separable words and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 這也可以認爲是離合詞語分合的一個制約因素。

sentences.english: These fans have a thermostatically controlled viscous clutch.
sentences.chinese: 這些風扇有一個恆溫控制的粘液離合器。

sentences.english: It is specially apply for light and medium auto.
sentences.chinese: 特別適用於輕，中型汽車離合器使用。

definition: joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
a transition (stop and change) in spoken sound, music or in brush strokes/a cadence/punctuated by a transition/with syncopated cadence (brush stroke in painting)
to turn upside down/to reverse/back to front/confused/deranged/crazy

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
